Beauty

Slideshow

beauty is the experience of pleasure and satisfaction.
beauty is that thing worth living and dying for.
beauty is oneness and diversity in harmony.

oneness & diversity
harmony

Tap the screen to check if they meet, or not, the formula of beauty.
